Description:
Commanding Presence Comfortable Living
With a commanding street presence at the top of the Crescent, this regal residence on 1,034 sq m (approx.) was built with quality in mind.
Featuring flawless workmanship from the owner/builder throughout, upon entrance the golden tones of wooden floorboards set the scene for what is an all round beautiful family home.
The first of two living zones, a separate front lounge enjoys a magnificent outlook over the manicured front gardens via an elegant bay window.
Access to a dining space, outdoor entertaining deck and the open plan kitchen can be gained from this family relaxation room.
Quality bench tops highlight the classically designed kitchen, featuring a large double oven with gas cooking, rangehood, dishwasher, walk-in pantry and appliance cupboard.
Built with easy connection in mind, an open and light-filled space, the kitchen and dining areas have views and access to multiple outdoor areas, the second living room including an open fireplace and plenty of seating room.
Accommodation is all housed upstairs with a main bedroom including triple built-in robes, ensuite and feature led light window the pick of the bedrooms. Three further bedrooms all have plenty of room for a double bed, cooling ceiling fans and include built-in robes.
Central and with separate shower and bath, the checker tiled main bathroom is cleverly placed to cater for the growing family while a foyer style space at the top of the stairs will ensure there's plenty of room to cope with a busy lifestyle.
Accessible from all sides, the covered outdoor entertaining deck is a real feature here. With high ceilings and a huge amount of covered space, this is the perfect position for entertaining friends and family all year round.
Surrounded by trees, manicured gardens, rockery, eclectic steps and level, landscaped grassed areas the backyard has something for everyone and is ready for a new family to enjoy its many benefits.
Spectacular from entry to exit, this property also includes ducted heating, ceiling fans, split-system air-conditioning and double lock-up garage with internal access, providing the ideal setting for a comfortable family life.
In a location within walking distance to the magnificent Tintern Education Precinct, close to Ringwood Secondary College, Ringwood East shopping, Maroondah Highway, Eastlink and the ever re-developing Eastland Shopping Centre, this is a stand out property which is sure to impress.
- Built and lived in by owner/builder
- Walking distance to Tintern schooling
- Multiple living spaces and open fireplace
- Gas ducted heating and air-conditioning
- Covered outdoor entertaining deck
- Spectacular from start to finish

Description:
A Splendid Opportunity!
Tucked peacefully into a quiet avenue enjoying its own leafy park and playground, and placed within moments of highly regarded amenities, this excellently presented brick veneer abode is assured a high level of interest from a range of astute home seekers, with the additional appeal of sub divisional options (STCA) of the 892sqm (approx.) allotment.
Delightfully light filled, the home's inviting interiors feature richly toned, hardwood floors highlighting a generous lounge and dining domain with large windows framing leafy outlooks and allowing in plenty of natural light.
Centrally positioned within the home, the sky lit kitchen has been updated boasting chic modern benchtops and cabinetry, a breakfast bar and quality Fisher & Paykel, stainless-steel appliances including a 900mm gas cooktop and rangehood, dishwasher and electric oven.
In addition, a considerable family zone features a modern dcor, complementing the classic exposed beams and cosy gas log fire to create a most enjoyable domain for relaxing or entertaining; further enjoying full height windows and glass sliding doors providing a lush outlook, and access out to both the sunny alfresco and lovely gardens blooming with colour, lemon tree and veggie planters, as well as plenty of room for kids and pets to play.
Additionally, the three sizeable bedrooms all benefit from full height fitted robes (main and second with mirrored finishes), sharing the bright, spotless family bathroom with a separate shower and bathtub, plus two separate toilets.
Notable inclusions list as; (two year old) ducted heating, reverse cycle air-conditioning, separate laundry, external awnings, garden shed, off-street parking, secure parking behind gates leading to the lock-up garage with rear workshop area.
Desirably located within walking distance of kinders and childcare centres, Tinternvale Primary and Tintern Grammar, plus Eastfield Shopping Centre and bus transport, and close to Croydon, Ringwood East and Ringwood townships offering shopping options, rail transport, recreational facilities including the new Aquanation plus Merrindale and Eastland Shopping Centres, Aquinas and Ringwood Secondary Colleges, medical services and EastLink momentarily accessed.
An engaging family residence ready to be enjoyed with opportunity to explore development potential (STCA), call to register your interest today!
